channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Privileged Identity Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Privileged Identity Manager

item.title: CVE-2018-1622|2024-09-17T02:52:58.921Z -- ibm -- security%20privileged%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Privileged Identity Manager Virtual Appliance 2.2.1 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 144348.

item.title: CVE-2018-1623|2024-09-17T02:31:27.256Z -- ibm -- security%20privileged%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Privileged Identity Manager Virtual Appliance 2.2.1 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 144408.

item.title: CVE-2018-1625|2024-09-17T00:50:48.106Z -- ibm -- security%20privileged%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Privileged Identity Manager Virtual Appliance 2.2.1 generates an error message that includes sensitive information about its environment, users, or associated data. IBM X-Force ID: 144410.
